product_title: Gourmia Compact 2‑Qt Digital Air Fryer – Space‑Saving Mini Fryer with 10 One‑Touch Presets, FryForce 360° Rapid Air, LED Display, Dishwasher‑Safe Basket
about_product: Perfectly-Sized 2‑Quart Capacity – Compact footprint ideal for dorms, small apartments, and single meals—great for 1–2 people and easy kitchen storage
Powerful FryForce 360° Air Tech – Delivers 360° rapid-air circulation for crispy, golden results using up to 98% less oil than traditional frying—without sacrificing flavor
10 One-Touch Digital Presets – Includes presets like Fries, Chicken, Fish, Shrimp, Veggies, Bake, Roast, Reheat, Dehydrate & Keep Warm—cook favorite foods quickly with no guesswork
LED Display + Adjustable Time & Temp – Intuitive LED interface ensures precise control from 175°F to 400°F and up to 30 minutes—plus includes auto shut‑off and overheat protection
Easy Clean & Dishwasher Safe – Non-stick fryer basket and crisp tray are dishwasher safe—cleanup is a breeze for hassle-free daily use
product_description: Enjoy healthy, flavorful results in a small footprint with the Gourmia GAF249 Compact 2‑Qt Digital Air Fryer. Designed for convenience, this mini fryer uses FryForce 360° rapid air circulation to cook crispy golden favorites with up to 98% less oil, making it perfect for guilt-free cooking. Its handy 10 one-touch presets streamline meal prep—from fries and chicken to veggies and even dehydration. The bright LED display gives you full control over temperature (175–400 °F) and time settings, while built-in auto shut-off ensures safety. This compact fryer fits effortlessly on any countertop or in small kitchens. Cleaning is easy thanks to the dishwasher-safe non-stick basket and tray. Whether you're single, cooking for two, or just love quick meals, the GAF249 combines powerful performance with space-saving design—delivering convenience and flavor in one sleek, portable package.

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: #40,414 in Kitchen & Dining (See Top 100 in Kitchen & Dining)  #145 in Air Fryers

customers_say: Customers find the air fryer easy to clean and appreciate its compact size that fits perfectly in small kitchens. The appliance heats quickly, with one customer noting it's almost as fast as a microwave for reheating. They like its ease of use, with one mentioning it's as simple as pressing one button, and appreciate its temperature control features, with one highlighting the 10 one-touch presets. Customers value its versatility, with one noting it's perfect for solo dinners.

top_reviews.review_comment: This air fryer is ideal for smaller kitchens or only feeding a couple people. The small footprint is easy to find space for and it does fit under cabinets no problem, without even needing to pull it out to access the controls. The basket holds about 2L, I only fill half full so there is room to shake things around in the basket. I like it for fries, chicken strips, even reheating a slice of pizza. There is a removable insert tray that lets air circulate underneath for even cooking. That makes cleaning easier for me as well. The whole basket is non-stick and easy to just wipe clean but it is dishwasher safe and fully washable. The one-touch controls cover most of my needs making operation as simple as pressing one button most of the time. For times I need to tweak the time and temperature, I can do that as well. I love this machine when cooking for myself. It heats quick, cooks fast and makes great, crispy food.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Quick meals and easy clean up
top_reviews.review_comment: I really appreciate how user-friendly this air fryer is. Its speed and simplicity make it perfect for my family, who are always on the go. My teenager even takes advantage of it, preparing his own dinner every night since our schedules don’t align. It’s so convenient that I keep it on the counter, as it doesn’t occupy much space. It can effortlessly cook a wide range of dishes like fries, wings, chicken, bacon, and more with just a press of a button. Plus, the precise temperature control and timer guarantee that every meal turns out perfectly each time.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Small but Mighty – Perfect for Quick, Crispy Meals!
top_reviews.review_comment: I’m really impressed with this little Gourmia 2-quart air fryer! It’s compact enough to fit perfectly in my small kitchen, but still powerful enough to whip up a crispy batch of fries or perfectly cooked chicken in no time. The FryForce 360° tech works great—everything comes out evenly cooked with that golden crunch, and I barely use any oil. The 10 one-touch presets are super convenient and take the guesswork out of cooking. I’ve tried several already—Fries, Bake, and Reheat—and they’ve all delivered great results. The digital display is clean and easy to use, and I love that it has built-in safety features like auto shut-off and overheat protection. Cleanup is a breeze too. The basket and tray pop right out and go straight into the dishwasher. If you're cooking for one or two people, this is a solid, affordable option that doesn't take over your counter. Great value and I use it almost daily!
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: It's perfect for my needs. It doesn't take up a lot of space and holds enough for a meal. Please note it is small. Only get this size if you are doing meals for a single person or a couple. This would not be appropriate for family meals. Every thing I have cooked in it has come out perfectly cooked each time. I like that it comes with a cooking guide as to how much time is needed for different foods. It's super easy to clean even if you don't line it. It preheat quickly, it gives alerts and reminders on the display to add food or turn food or to say that the food is done. Which is great because it's relatively quiet and I can be a lil forgetful.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Small but Sassy and Surprisingly Handy
top_reviews.review_comment: This little air fryer doesn’t take up much space, but it’s been pulling its weight like a champ in my tiny kitchen. It’s perfect for solo dinners—just toss in some veggies or frozen dumplings and boom, dinner with barely any cleanup. The presets make it feel fancier than it is, and I love not having to guess how long to cook my sweet potato fries. That said, if you’re trying to feed more than one hungry person, it fills up fast. I’ve definitely had to do a second batch more than once. But for someone who lives alone and refuses to eat soggy microwave food, it’s been a pretty solid upgrade. And the basket goes in the dishwasher, which honestly might be my favorite feature.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: I'm not even ashamed to admit that I got this two court air fryer to travel with because I've gotten so spoiled that when I have to reheat food the microwave just doesn't do it for me anymore because I want my food to come back out with his reheated with the same crispy crunchiness that it had when it was first given to me. I would say it's durable because it stood up to several road trips and being hauled in and out of airbnbs and hotels. The controls are straightforward works just basically like any other air fryer I've ever used. Almost as fast as a microwave when reheating something. This really can save your leftover waffle fries from being tossed, lol. Small enough to fit underneath any set of cabinets I've encountered and doesn't take up a whole lot of precious countertop real estate.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: I like this as an air fryer
top_reviews.review_comment: This is doing a nice job to air fry my frozen waffles. It is easy to operate. It's compact, not taking up too much space on the counter.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: Perfect size for 1-2 people. Compact, convenient and easy to use and clean!
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2025
